root.name: Dr. Brain Thinking Games IQ Adventures
root.description: Dr Brain Thinking Games IQ Adventure is third-person adventure game published by Knowledge Adventure in 1999. The game is aimed at younger players aged around 9 years and older. The objective of the game is that the player has to find and use objects to restore a trans-dimensional device designed by Dr. Brain that has trapped him in a strange dimension. You character has to solve puzzles to get pieces before dangerous objects in the environment zap away all of your brainpower. Â The locations include a Jungle, Cavern, Outpost and Metropolis. The player can also use items collected from finishing puzzles to help them access different and new parts of the levels.
